name: Carrot Slime 2
description:
Welcome to Carrot Slime 2!

As the name suggests, this is the second version of the first carrot slime I made to see how much I have improved over time.

Get to the golden carrot as fast as you can whilst picking up beetroots and normal carrots along the way!

Made in Game Maker Studio 2

Note:

Tile set by https://rottingpixels.itch.io/
